D

died() - Method in class MyStats
You should call this method whenever you get eaten.

E

eaten() - Method in interface GhostInterface
Called when the ghost is eaten by a Pac-Man You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), indicate that you've died, and add yourself back to the GhostArea
eaten() - Method in interface PacManInterface
Called when pac-man is eaten by a Ghost You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), and indicate that you've died

G

Returns how many times you've moved, if you call moved whenever you act.

Returns your current score.
getSuperTime() - Method in class MyStats
Returns how much time is left on your supertimer.
GhostArea - Class in <Unnamed>
The GhostArea houses Ghosts initially until they are told to release themselves.
GhostInterface - Interface in <Unnamed>
Ghosts must extend Actor and implement this interface.

H

hasGhost() - Method in class GhostArea
Returns true if this ghost area currently has ghosts waiting to be released.

I

M

moved() - Method in class MyStats
You should call this method everytime your Pac-Man or Ghost moves to an adjacent position in the grid during their act method.
MyStats - Class in <Unnamed>
MyStats is used to record and retrieve statistics about a Pac-Man or Ghost.

P

Pac-Man must extend Actor and implement this interface.

step() - Method in class PacManWorld
 
superPacMan(boolean) - Method in interface GhostInterface
Called when any Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Ghosts should set their color to BLUE when a pacman is super and return to their original color when they've stopped.
superPacMan(boolean, Actor) - Method in interface PacManInterface
Called when this Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Pac-Man should set their color to BLUE when pacman turns super and return to their original color when they've stopped.

Walls represents obstructions in the world and must not be moved onto.
